Aeronca Aircraft Corporation transferred ownership of Aircraft Type Certificate 
 No. A-802 to Aeronca Manufacturing Corporation on August 18, 1950. 
 Aeronca Manufacturing Corporation transferred ownership of Aircraft Type Certificate 
 No. A-802 to Aeronca, Inc., on May 13, 1966. 
 Aeronca, Inc., transferred ownership of Aircraft Type Certificate No. A-802 to William 
 Brad Mitchell or Sandra Mitchell on April 11, 1991. 
 William Brad Mitchell transferred ownership of Aircraft Type Certificate No. A-802 
 to Burl A. Rogers on July 10, 2000. 
 Burl A. Rogers transferred ownership of Aircraft Type Certificate No. A-802 
 to AeroSedan, LLC on September 15, 2015.
